title: Trafalgar Tours Best of India
inclusions_evidence: An expert Travel Director and professional Driver
Cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted
All hotel tips, charges and local taxes
Breakfast daily and up to half of your evening meals
Luxury air-conditioned coach with Wi-Fi in most countries or alternative transportation

other.notes: Estimated costs for meals and sightseeing based on average prices.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive package including flights, accommodations, meals, and guided tours, which is significantly cheaper than booking each component separately.
additional_notes: The deal provides a well-rounded experience with cultural insights and local interactions.
